title: Divine Lakshmi Kada - Auspicious Gold & Diamond Bracelet
features: This exquisitely crafted Kada features a central motif of Goddess Lakshmi, the Hindu goddess of wealth, fortune, and prosperity. The divine image is meticulously detailed and surrounded by a halo of dazzling brilliant-cut diamonds. Open filigree work enhances the design and creates a delicate, airy feel. The bracelet has a secure hinge for easy wear. The Hyderabadi polish gives a rich, lasting luster.
colors: Antique Gold highlights on Lakshmi figurine
occasions: or religious ceremonies. A symbol of prosperity and divine blessing
ideal for gifting on special occasions like Akshaya Tritiya or housewarmings.
description: Embrace tradition with this auspicious Lakshmi Kada. The intricate craftsmanship and divine motif make it a powerful symbol of prosperity and blessings. The high-quality diamonds and 22K gold ensure lasting beauty and value. A statement piece that seamlessly blends tradition with contemporary elegance. Its flexibility makes it a comfortable fit for various wrist sizes.
